column2: X-Men: The End - Men and X-Men (2006) #6
column6:
The long-awaited climax! Who lives, who dies, who changes-and why, after the conclusion of this adventure, is there no longer a need for X-Men?,2006,6
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
